quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: Movie and Title
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, title, didnt. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which movie title was translated in China as Who Is Face Belonging To? I Kill You Again, Harder!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Face/Off

questions.question: Ungrateful Adulteress! I Chop Off Your Finger! is the Chinese title of this movie.

questions.question: Delicate Orbs of Womanhood Bigger Than Your Head Can Hurt You was the Chinese title of this movie remake.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Barb Wire

why we go to an auction

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: My Best Friends Wedding

questions.question: Great Buddha! I Can Smell You From Afar! Take a Bath, Will You?! is the Chinese title of this movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scent of a Woman

questions.question: Which movie title was translated as Big Dumb Monkey-Man Keeps Whacking Tree With Genitals in China and asThe Jungle Died Laughing in Israel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George of the Jungle

questions.question: Come to My Cave and Wear This Rubber Codpiece, Cute Boy the Chinese title of this movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Batman  Robin

questions.question: So, You Are a Lawyer? is the Chinese title of this movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Interview With The Vampire

questions.question: In China this movie was called He’s A Ghost!and in Hong Kong or Macao its called Ghost Eyes.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Sixth Sense

questions.question: Although the movie didnt come out until 1996, its Chinese title is: Excitement 1995. And just to include some other countries: Finland = Rita Hayworth -The Key to the Escape, Israel =Walls of Hope and Greece = Last Exit: Rita Hayworth. One of these is close to the title and one gives away the ending.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Shawshank Redemption

questions.question: Define absentee.

options.text: something you smell but cant identify

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a missing golfing accessory

options.text: used on a movie set to hold up a ganda

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a gentlemanly goose

questions.question: What movie title was translated in China as I Am That Guy From Seinfeld So Its Acceptable for Straight People to Enjoy This Gay Movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Love! Valour! Compassion!

quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: Bar and China
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, title, kangaroo. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What movie title was translated in China as Earth And Comet Collide?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Deep Impact

questions.question: The title of this American movie was translated in China as A Very Powerful Whale Runs To Heaven.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Free Willy

questions.question: What movie title was translated in China as Trump Card Big Liar?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Austin Powers

questions.question: A kangaroo walks into a bar. He orders a beer. The bartender says, Thatll be $10. You know, we dont get many kangaroos coming in here, you know. The kangaroo says, ______________________

options.text: Well, when we get drunk we get hopping mad.
Well, the bars just not that convenient for us.
At $10 a beer, its not hard to understand.
Im really a wallaby in drag.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: At $10 a beer, its not hard to understand.

questions.question: What movie title was translated in China as Run! Ruuunnnn! Cloudzillaaaaa!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Twister

questions.question: A man walks into a bar and says, Give me a beer before problems start! Again, the man orders a beer again saying, Give me a beer before problems start! The bartender looks confused. This goes on for a while, and after the fifth beer the bartender is totally confused and asks the man When are you going to pay for these beers? The man answers, ________________

options.text: Gee, I though they were free!
I would, if I could, but I cant.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Now the problems start!

questions.question: A guy walks into a bar and there is a horse behind the bar serving drinks. The guy is just staring at the horse, when the horse says, What are you staring at? Havent you ever seen a horse serving drinks before? The guy says, _________________________

options.text: Yes but I thought it was over on the next block.
Well go next door and see whos the bartender.
No, I never thought the parrot would sell the place.
Boy, you sure havent been around this neighborhood before.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No, I never thought the parrot would sell the place.

questions.question: What one-word movie title was translated in China as The Happy Dumpling-to-be Who Talks And Solves Agricultural Problems?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Babe

questions.question: I met this gal in a bar, and one thing led to another, I said, Lets go back to my place. She said, Oh, do you have cable? I said, ________________________

options.text: Yes, but I didnt think we would be watching TV.
No, but I have a satellite dish.
No, but I have some old ropes that should do just fine.
Yes, and I have a refrigerator and microwave as well.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No, but I have some old ropes that should do just fine.

questions.question: What movie title was translated in China as Son of Devil?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Junior

questions.question: A drunk stammers out of a bar and runs right into two priests. He says, Im Jesus Christ. The first priest says, No, son, youre not. So the drunk says it to the second priest. The second priest says, No, son, youre not. The drunk says, Look, I can prove it. He walks back into the bar with the two priests. The bartender takes one look at the drunk and exclaims,

options.text: Sweet Mother Mary Malone, not again!
Back again to pay your bill?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jesus Christ, youre here again?

questions.question: In China this movie was called The Big Liar.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nixon

questions.question: A patron ordered a Manhattan. When served there was a piece of parsley floating in the glass. What in the world is this? asked the man.The bartender replied, ________________

options.text: Its free so get over it.
Its better than the poison ivy we used last week.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Central Park.

questions.question: A piece of string walked into a bar and said Gimme a beer! but the bartender said Get outta here! We dont serve your kind here! So the string left, but he was thirsty, and he really wanted a beer, so he messed up his hair real badly and looped himself around until he had tied himself into a knot. When the string went back into the bar, the bartender looked at him suspiciously and said Arent you that worthless piece of string I just threw outta here? No, the string replied,

options.text: Are you kidding, Im a mess!

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Im a frayed knot!

questions.question: What American movie is known in China under the title I Will Marry A Prostitute and Save Money?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pretty Woman

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Bar and Dog
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, pair, title. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: If you sight a whale, it could be a ___________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: fluke

questions.question: This mushroom walks into a bar and starts hitting on this woman. She, of course, turns him down. Not willing, to give up, he pleads with her, ____________________

options.text: Cmon lady, Im a fun guy.
I just got out of prison, so plllllleaaasssseeeee.
But guys just want to have fun.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cmon lady, Im a fun guy.

questions.question: The title of what movie was translated in China as Six Naked Pigs?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Full Monty

questions.question: If you break a string on your guitar dont ___________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: fret

questions.question: I used to work in a blanket factory but it ___________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: folded

questions.question: Im glad I know sign language, its _________________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: pretty handy

questions.question: I relish the fact that youve ______  the strength to______  to me.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: mustard - ketchup

questions.question: I used to have a fear of hurdles, but I _______________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: got over it

questions.question: Shes happy to make a pair of pants for you, or at least ____________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: sew it seams

questions.question: She got fired from the hot dog stand for ________________.

options.text: putting her hair in a bun

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: putting her hair in a bun

questions.question: Mummies are bound to be _________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: uptight

questions.question: Which movie title was translated in China as Mysterious Murder in Snowy Cream?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fargo

questions.question: A drunk guy is sitting in a bar. There is a very buxom lady a few seats down. A fellow at the end of the bar calls for a beer. The bartender fills the mug and slides it down the bar. It hits the ladys breasts and spills all over them. The bartender goes over, retrieves the glass and licks the beer off of her breasts. This happens a couple more times. The next time, the drunk jumps up and starts to lick her breasts. She decks him. Hes laying on the floor and moans, Why do you let the bartender do it? _____________________

options.text: Because he has a liquor license!

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Because he has a liquor license!

questions.question: When a clock is hungry it goes back __________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: four seconds

questions.question: A man walked into a bar and sat down next to a man with a dog at his feet. Does your dog bite? he asked. No. A few minutes later the dog took a huge chunk out of the mans leg. I thought you said your dog doesnt bite! he said indignantly. The other guy replied, __________________

options.text: It smelled too good to pass up.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thats not my dog.

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Apple and Film
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, people, theory. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the medical term for Adams Apple?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: laryngeal prominence

questions.question: The name of which legendary island comes from a word meaning apple?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Avalon

questions.question: What are the colors of the apple cards in the party game Apples to Apples, also known as The Game of Hilarious Comparisons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: red and green

questions.question: What famous band founded the Apple Records label in 1968?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Beatles

questions.question: The apple is an attribute associated with this goddess that is often depicted holding it.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Venus

questions.question: Police were called to a daycare where a three-year-old was _____________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: resisting a rest

questions.question: In Latin, the word for apple (mālum) is nearly identical to a word that means which of the following?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: evil

questions.question: A critic remark about this 1975 film stated that About 45 minutes in, it became apparent to one and all that this was one of the worst and most embarrassing major-talent turkeys of all time. It won The Golden Turkey Award as it was said to destroy sixteen beautiful Cole Porter melodies. Another critic remarked that the film can be regarded as the great white elephant catastrophe of its time. Peter Bogdanovich should be ashamed of himself.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: At Long Last Love

questions.question: Which of these people was not one of the co-founders of the Apple Inc. corporation?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paul Allen

questions.question: This film from 1970 is one disowned by Gore Vidal who called it an awful joke. A Time Magazine critic said this movie was about as funny as a child molester. The Book of Lists stated that there was something in the movie to offend absolutely everyone.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Myra Breckinridge

questions.question: What scientist often told the story that he was inspired to formulate his theory of gravitation by watching the fall of an apple from a tree?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Isaac Newton

questions.question: This 1981 war movie has been called the most expensive B-movie ever. Sun Myung Moon of the Unification church financed much of this film.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Inchon

questions.question: William Tell, who, according to legend shot an apple off the head of his son, is a folk hero of this country.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Switzerland

questions.question: What kind of apple does the Queen offer Snow White in the 1937 Disney movie Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: wishing apple

questions.question: Although this film cost $44 million due to time overruns, it only grossed $3.5 million. Heres some critics comments on this 1980 film: unqualified disaster, the most scandalous cinematic waste Ive ever seen., beyond belief. In 2012 a reedited version was presented at the New York Film Festival to critical acclaim.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Heavens Gate
